actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act to permit the marketing of certain food additives if the Secretary determines that their probable carcinogenic effect on humans is extremely small.

summary.text: Food Additive Amendments - Amends the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act to permit the marketing of certain food additives if the Secretary of Health, Education, and Welfare determines that their probable carcinogenic effect on humans is so small that such additives may be deemed safe.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act to permit the marketing of certain food additives if the Secretary determines that their probable carcinogenic effect on humans is extremely small.
